title: Con / Sr. Con - Business Analyst - GO/JC/20925/2025
description:
Job Description

Generic Business Analyst Candidate Specification: Any Graduate, Overall 5+ years Job Description: Must have 5+ years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in Banking and Finance Requirement Gathering & Analysis: Collaborate with stakeholders (internal and external) to gather, document, and analyse business requirements. Business Process Improvement: Identify areas for process optimization and recommend improvements to increase operational efficiency. Technical Skills: Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word), experience with data analysis tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI), and familiarity with Business Process Management (BPM) tools.

Skills Required

RoleCon / Sr. Con - Business Analyst
